column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: reviewer. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```rdf@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix reviewer: <http://www.example.com/reviewer#> .# Class Definitionsreviewer:Reviewer    rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:comment "An individual who reviews items or experiences" ;    rdfs:label "Reviewer" .reviewer:Item    rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:comment "An item or experience that a reviewer can review" ;    rdfs:label "Item" .reviewer:Review    rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:comment "A review of an item or experience by a reviewer" ;    rdfs:label "Review" .# Property Definitionsreviewer:reviews    rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain reviewer:Reviewer ;    rdfs:range reviewer:Review ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that a reviewer has issued a review" ;    rdfs:label "reviews" .reviewer:hasReviewer    rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain reviewer:Review ;    rdfs:range reviewer:Reviewer ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that a review is associated with a reviewer" ;    rdfs:label "hasReviewer" .reviewer:aboutItem    rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain reviewer:Review ;    rdfs:range reviewer:Item ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the item or experience that a review is about" ;    rdfs:label "aboutItem" .# Individual Definitionsreviewer:John_Doe rdf:type reviewer:Reviewer .reviewer:Book_A rdf:type reviewer:Item .reviewer:Review_1    rdf:type reviewer:Review ;    reviewer:hasReviewer reviewer:John_Doe ;    reviewer:aboutItem reviewer:Book_A .```This file defines an ontology about reviewers, including classes for reviewers, items (which can be reviewed), and reviews. It also includes properties that connect reviewers to their reviews, and reviews to the items they are about. Finally, individual instances of these classes are given to serve as examples or test cases.
